FuncDef: This command configures up to seven time-ranges applicable to a particular override-id. The time-range can be configured as daily or weekly policies.

ParaDef.Info: Schedule the override as a daily occurrence.

Schedule the override as a weekly occurrence. Values-start-time|daily |	<hh>:<mm>, |weekly |	<day>,<hh>:<mm>, ||<hh> : 0..23, ||<mm> : 0 | 15 | 30 | 45, end-time		|daily 	| <hh>:<mm>, |			weekly |<day>,<hh>:<mm>, ||<hh> 0..23, ||<mm> 0 | 15 | 30 | 45, day |sunday | monday | tuesday | wednesday | thursday | friday | saturday.
